articles.description: The Fiido X e-bike can break in two. The China-based company has warned riders to stop using the bike with recall information to follow soon.
articles.content:
Welp
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.
The Fiido X e-bike is supposed to fold, not break in two.
Photo: Javier (cib)
Fiido, maker … [+1711 chars]
